replies.msg:
曼聯終極FF轉會新聞暨吹水區FAQ！

想知去Old Trafford朝聖，係邊度買波飛最平最有保證﹖

想知係Old Trafford睇波，坐邊個看台最爽﹖

想知去Carrington訓練基地度等班球員攞簽名同合照應該點做﹖

想知新球季係邊度買波衫最平、印字最好﹖

想知點寄信去曼聯官方問佢攞球星相同簽名﹖

同埋想知一啲遊覽曼徹斯特市小Tips﹖

詳情請click入https://goo.gl/wLBkmb。另歡迎各位有興趣留啲心得分享比巴打們嘅巴打，係以上嘅link度留下備註，小弟會幫手加落篇文度(記得加番自己個會員名，方便credit你!)。大家亦可以係曼po度留言，我見到嘅話亦會加番落個google doc度。如果1001開po嘅巴打覺得啱洗，歡迎將啲FAQ或者呢一段文字放係第二個comment度，方便大家查閱。覺得冇需要嘅請ignore。特別感謝【Berbatov】、【黑白灰......】、【特西】、【活華特】、【SNOOZE】、【朗隊】以及【曼聯聯盟2】之巴打提供心得。

伊巴真係岩踢曼聯咩
依家隊曼基本上都係主要打快速反擊
係摩佬體系下 兩翼加攻中好多時都番到自己後半場 所以隻前鋒要有速度自己帶波衝散對面後防 依樣係伊巴無嘅野
上季好多時隊波打緊反擊 兩翼同攻中縮得太後 就算伊巴hold到波 啲反擊都唔夠快
令到啲反擊變到好似無乜威脅
唔係話佢技術有問題
佢做傳控串連都重係世界級 如果隊波有後上入攝能力好強嘅球員佢會好岩洗
但係曼聯依個打法真係唔太需要依類球員

照你咁講 對大巴應該用廢老mk馬達hehe?

The two Reds played for 59 minutes in the 1-1 draw against Swansea City’s youth side at Leigh Sports Village, stepping up their individual comebacks following a summer of hard work in rehabilitation. It is a big boost to the manager with plenty of fixtures to come in September, although neither man is ready just yet.

Both Young and Shaw were pictured training with the first-team on Tuesday morning, alongside another of the club’s injured players Marcos Rojo. The Argentina international has been missing with a knee problem since March and the manager provided an update on his progress while speaking to MUTV on Friday.

"Young will be earlier than Luke," said Jose. "There are seven matches to play in September in three different competitions, sometimes just two days between matches, so we need our squad. We need everyone."

Expanding on Rojo, the boss continued: “Again, there is no rush. When I see him run, I like it. It doesn’t look like somebody with an injury. There is no limping, there are no details of injury, but that is just body language, that is just straight running. Football is different, we have to respect the timings and the timings are bringing Marcos to the team around December, not before.”

After impressive displays in the opening two games, Mourinho could be tempted to name the same starting line-up for the third successive match. Luke Shaw and Ashley Young are nearing a return to first-team action after both played an hour for United's Under-23s against Swansea on Monday evening, while Marcos Rojo returned to training on Tuesday as he continues his own rehabilitation from a serious knee problem.

The boss gave an update on the trio in his MUTV interview on Friday. Zlatan Ibrahimovic returned to the club on Thursday but is still on the road to recovering from a knee injury. Meanwhile, Leicester will be without the injured Robert Huth and Vicente Iborra, while former Reds midfielder Danny Drinkwater and ex-Manchester City striker Kelechi Iheanacho have trained after minor injuries. Last season's top scorer Jamie Vardy is fully recovered from the ankle problem which forced him off against Brighton last weekend but defender Harry Maguire is a slight doubt with a knee complaint.
